titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 4516) making appropriations for the Legislative Branch for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2001, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-797, by Mr. Linder.
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 4516 with 1 hour of general debate. Waives points of order against the conference report and against its consideration.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 268.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 565.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS ON H. RES. 565 - At the conclusion of debate on the resolution, the Chair put the question on adoption of the resolution and by voice vote, announced that the ayes had prevailed. A roll call vote was demanded and the Chair postponed further proceedings on adoption of the resolution until later in the legislative day.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 214 - 210, 1 Present (Roll no. 448).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/26/2000--Introduced. Waives points of order against consideration of the conference report on H.R. 4516 (legislative branch appropriations).
